_source.short_desc: Experts in Infor SyteLine/CloudSuite Industrial for 30+ years, LogicData assists manufacturers in achieving their operational success.
_source.long_desc: The ultimate in deep manufacturing functionality for the complex, mid-market manufacturer, Infor's CloudSuite Industrial (SyteLine) provides you with end-to-end functionality to manage all aspects of your enterprise.  This is a mixed mode manufacturing product that can simultaneously handle discrete, process, build to order, build to stock and project style manufacturing.  And with LogicDatas 30+ years of experience working exclusively with SyteLine, we will help ensure your success.
_source.target_audience: Metal/plastic fabricators, machinery/equipment, medical device, automotive, aerospace/defense, electronics, furniture,  windows/doors, food/beverage, paint/coatings, distributors. 2 tier ERP support.

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Milestone Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor task progress and planned accomplishments to better manage project status

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Status Tracking
category_features.definition: Reporting on changes over time to the state of a request, a prosess, or an object

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Notifications for new property listings

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Client/Property Matching
category_features.definition: Matching property according to applicants

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Lead Management
category_features.definition: Store information about leads and contacts and track them through the sales process

category_features.name: Referral Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and store the source of contacts/leads

category_features.name: Segmentation
category_features.definition: Group leads or contacts based on their specific characteristics

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: A visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective for your team on any project in a fun, flexible, and rewarding way.
related_products.features: From sales and marketing to HR and operations, teams can design and customize Trello to fit their unique needs and work styles. And with over 100+ integrations with other key tools like Google Drive, Slack, Jira and more, Trello is a living, breathing project hub of cross-team collaboration no matter where your work needs to happen. Trello brings joy to teamwork by making it transparent and easily shareable across boards and teams.

related_products.short_desc: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Millions choose Jira to plan and build great products. Try free!
related_products.features: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Teams of 2 to 20,000 rely on Jira to manage every stage of their workflow, from planning to shipping and releasing. With native roadmaps, teams can ladder up their work to track the big picture. Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a project tracking tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: Schedule jobs, coordinate teams, track time and track projects, all in one place.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Time is a proud part of the QuickBooks family, seamlessly connecting with leading accounting tools like QuickBooks Online, ADP and more. Easily manage people, projects and payroll, all in one place

related_products.short_desc: ClickUp is the future of work - it's one app to replace them all. ClickUp is the #1 fastest growing productivity app in 2022.
related_products.features:
ClickUp is an all-in-one productivity platform that eliminates work silos. It's the hub where teams come together to plan, organize, and collaborate on work using tasks, Docs, Chat, Goals, Whiteboards, and more. 

Easily customized with just a few clicks, ClickUp helps teams of all types and sizes deliver work more effectively. By replacing inflexible and overlapping tools, ClickUp helps teams save one day each week!

related_products.short_desc: From basic projects to complex portfolio management--teams deliver their best work when they use monday.com's open platform.
related_products.features: monday.com Work OS is an open platform that brings teams together with custom-built solutions to break communication barriers, move projects forward, and align everyone involved. Easily access all progress updates, budget approvals, and more on one platform so you can see where all of your team's work stands at a glance. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on-the-go without wifi, monday.com allows you to access important information and make better data-driven decisions quickly.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a project tracking software with templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, dashboards, custom request forms, reports, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is an award-winning project management software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Plan, execute, and report on projects using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

related_products.short_desc: Todoist is the world's #1 to-do list & task manager to organise your life and work.
related_products.features: Todoist is the world's #1 to-do list & task manager to organise your life and work. Regain clarity and calmness by getting tasks out of your head and into Todoist, no matter where you are or what device you use. It's a simple yet powerful to-do list app ranked best-in-class by Apple, Google, The Verge, Forbes, and more. Since 2007, over 25 million people have used Todoist to organize work and life, completing more than two billion tasks along the way.

related_products.short_desc: Resource management for agencies, studios, & firms across industries to plan projects, schedule resources, and manage their team's time
related_products.features:
The leading project planning app for agencies, studios and firms. Since 2012 Float has been helping the world's top teams at R/GA, Metalab and Buzzfeed plan their projects and schedule their teams time. With an easy to use, drag and drop interface, handy editing shortcuts and powerful reporting tools, Float makes resource management visual and simple. 

Integrate with Slack, Google Calendar and 1,000+ apps via Zapier. Make changes on the go with apps for iOS and Android. Free 30 day trial.

Easily access all progress updates, budget approvals, and more on one platform so you can see where all of your team's work stands at a glance. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on-the-go without wifi, monday.com allows you to access important information and make better data-driven decisions quickly.

similar_products.short_desc: Project managers use productboard to align everyone on the right features to build next.
similar_products.features: Productboard is the customer-driven product management system that empowers teams to get the right products to market, faster. It provides a complete solution for product teams to understand user needs, prioritize what to build next, align everyone on the roadmap, and engage with their customers. Productboard is easy to use, enables company-wide collaboration, and integrates into existing workflows. Over 6,000 organizations around the world use Productboard to build excellent products.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams. Millions choose Jira to plan and build great products. Try free!

Jira's no-code automation engine allows teams to save time and increase power by automating any task or process with a few clicks. And with a free edition, teams up to ten users can leverage all the power of Jira at no cost, forever.

similar_products.short_desc: Digital transformation of your project portfolio management to revolutionize the way your organization delivers.
similar_products.features:
Proggio is a project portfolio management solution crafted to give you the portfolio clarity and control you need to easily execute with managerial and team alignment. 

Unlimited users with every plan make company-wide adoption seamless. Get the full scope of your entire portfolio in a quick snapshot, along with signals, alerts, and notifications. You will always be in the know so you can make the right decisions at the right time.

Try for free. Start today >>

Plan, execute, and report on projects using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Work smarter, not harder with Wrike.

similar_products.short_desc: A completely reimagined UI, enhanced search and filters, easywork allocation, new portfolio dashboard, and more to transform your work.
similar_products.features:
Zoho Projects is a cloud based project management software with over 200,000 customers worldwide. It helps you plan your projects, and execute them with perfection. 

With Projects, you can assign tasks easily, communicate effectively with both your team and clients, be informed on all project updates, get detailed reports on work progress and deliver projects on time, everytime.

Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

similar_products.short_desc: Built for companies managing projects from start to finish that want an airplane view of everything that's going on in real-time.
similar_products.features: With Forecast, companies can track projects from start to finish with an airplane view of everything that's going on, including time and budget tracking. Forecast is a robust alternative to point solutions, uniting project management, resource planning, team collaboration, time management, finance, and reporting in one complete AI-powered package. It?s ideal for businesses that execute large complex projects without compromising on time, quality, budget, or other projects.

similar_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
similar_products.features:
Smartsheet, an online work execution platform, empowers organizations to plan, track, automate, and report on work. Over 80,000 brands rely on Smartsheet for project and work management because of its easy-to-use interface, real-time gantt charts and dashboards, and work automation features. 
*2018 Awards: Named a Leader in Enterprise Collaborative Work Management by Forrester Research, Selected to Deloittes Fast 500 List, Recognized for Technology Innovation & Vision by 451 Research

similar_products.short_desc: Discover the top project tracking solution built by services professionals, for services professionals.
similar_products.features: Discover the top project tracking solution built by services professionals, for services professionals. Kantata transforms your business by uniting project management, collaboration, time tracking, resource management, and project financials all in one place. Users experience better operational execution, greater business agility, and improved financial performance. Named leading project management solution by Gartner.

similar_products.short_desc: ZenHub helps agile software development teams and stakeholders track the progress of projects, business goals, and commitments.
similar_products.features: ZenHub helps agile software development teams and stakeholders track the progress of projects, business goals, and external commitments. Through a combination of planning and estimation tools, roadmaps, and customizable reports, ZenHub helps reduce risk by making project completion dates more predictable.

similar_products.short_desc: Flomatika is a Value Stream Management platform focused on faster and more predictable value delivery.
similar_products.features:
Flomatika provides near end-to-end visibility into product delivery flow, helping you to understand how your delivery ecosystem is performing to more effectively govern and steer.

The platform provides actionable insights and surfaces hidden constraints which hinder the ability to improve speed, increase quality and optimise value.

similar_products.short_desc: Project & code management, together at last. Plan work, track progress, and release code right in Backlog for all-in-one collaboration.
similar_products.features: Backlog is the all-in-one online project management tool for task management, version control, and bug tracking. Bringing together the organizational benefits of project management with the power and convenience of code management, Backlog enhances team collaboration across organizations large and small. Plan work, track progress, and release code updates right in Backlog. Core features include subtasking, custom statuses, Kanban-style boards, Gantt charts, burndown charts, Git & SVN, and Wikis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Project Management software is used by corporate IT teams and project managers to track task assignments, expenses, and progress of application development, maintenance, and deployment.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Nonprofit Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Nonprofit Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Nonprofit Project Management software can be used by nonprofit organizations to plan projects, set timelines, track budgets, and manage resources. This type of software commonly provides visual features to help teams collaborate on tasks and track project status.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Portfolio Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Portfolio Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Portfolio Management software makes it easier for project mangers and organizations to analyze and manage numerous projects simultaneously. Project Portfolio Management software helps you allocate resources across projects, and collaborate between project teams. It is designed to help administrators collectively monitor project goals and view reports for multiple projects in one place. Other categories related to Project Portfolio Management software include Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Resource Management software, and Task Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Resource Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Resource Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Resource Management software helps project planners allocate program resources. Project managers often use Resource Management software to analyze resource demand and capacity, to create predictive project forecasting. Businesses looking for Resource Management software may also be interested in Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, and Project Portfolio Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Task Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Task Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Task Management software allows groups of users to work together more cohesively to quickly and thoroughly complete projects. Features such as time tracking and project tracking ensure that all project tasks are covered and progress reports are up to date. Other functions include automatic time budgeting and timeline, email syncing, to-do list creation, collaborative interfaces for all users, and task reminders. Task Management software is related to Project Management software, Idea Management software, Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, and Workflow Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Reliable, real-time extended ERP software with lean and agile functionality developed especially for mid-market manufacturing companies

related_products.features: WinTeam is a holistic financial, operations & workforce management solution for cleaning & security contractors in North America. Includes accounting & financials, analytics & reporting, HR, compliance & benefits mgmt, payroll, job costing, work/people scheduling, quality assurance & inventory mgmt. It has employee & customer self-service plus time & attendance tracking. Streamline processes, connect back office to field ops & pinpoint profitability by site. Best fit for 100 employees or more.

related_products.short_desc: A complete QA solution to help you write better requirements, manage your test cases, and track defects.
related_products.features: SpiraTest is an integrated Requirements and Quality Management solution that manages your project's Requirements, Test Cases, Releases, Defects, and Issues in one environment, with complete traceability throughout.  After defining your project's requirements, you generate the test cases and test steps that validate the functionality. The test execution modules allow users to run through the tests, logging defects/issues as they go. SpiraTest is Fully Web-Based. Free 30-Day Trial.

related_products.short_desc: Increase plant productivity by 22% in 90 days by activating your frontline teams with Redzone's #1 Connected Workforce Solution.

-  74% Increase in Engage

Cority Quality Cloud automates and streamlines shop floor processes, manages the entire nonconformance lifecycle, and supports enterprise-wide continuous improvement initiatives. As a stand-alone EQMS or integrated with EHS, Cority helps make quality a competitive advantage.

related_products.short_desc: A comprehensive web-based and 100% paperless shop quality management system for small to medium manufacturing companies.
related_products.features: A comprehensive web-based and 100% paperless shop management system for small to medium manufacturing companies. related_products.short_desc: Integrated QHSE management system software, Cloud-based, helping SMB's manage compliance activities in a single, easy to use solution.

similar_products.features: ETQ is the world's most flexible, powerful & easy-to-use advanced QMS software for quality-centric organizations in dozens of industries. similar_products.short_desc: Web-Based Quality Management Software. Easily Connect Your Quality Processes. Manage FDA & ISO Compliance. Free Quote, Demo & Trial.

similar_products.short_desc: Arena's product-centric QMS connects quality and product processes to simplify regulatory compliance and speed product launches.
similar_products.features: Arena's product-centric quality management system (QMS) streamlines new product development and introduction (NPDI) by connecting quality and product processes. Arena ensures regulatory compliance to quality standards and regulations including FDA 21 CFR Part 820, Part 11 and ISO 13485. Arena QMS enhances visibility and traceability by controlling quality processes in context with bills of materials (BOMs), SOPs, DMRs, DHFs, specifications, drawings, and training plans. See ArenaSolutions.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Quality management solution that helps users manage documentation, compliance, workflows, risks, employees training and more.

Ideal for heavily-regulated industries, where compliance with standards including ISO 17025, 17020, 13485, and 9001, TNI, GFSI, FDA, and FQS are required.

Merit for Life Science with Microsoft Dynamics 365 is a cloud-first ERP solution intentionally tailored
for fast-growing biotech, pharmaceutical, and medical device organizations.

It advances Dynamics 365 finance and operations functionality to help life science organizations drive increased process efficiencies, ready for and support rapid growth, and meet valuation expectations while maintaining FDA CFR 21 part 11, EMA Annex 11, and other country-specific regulatory compliance.

similar_products.short_desc: Interfacing's EPC ensures full visibility from audit management, CAPA, regulatory training and management of standard operating procedu
similar_products.features: Interfacing's Enterprise Process Center (EPC) provides a formalized system that documents processes, procedures, and responsibilities for achieving quality policies and objectives.  Our tools ensure full visibility from end-to-end, all the way from the creation and amendment of a regulation to the approval and revision of the content through to the update and retraining of employees for standard operating procedures (SOPs)

similar_products.short_desc: WinSPC applies real-time SPC to manufacturers' processes so they can create the highest quality product for the lowest possible cost.
similar_products.features: WinSPC helps manufacturers create the highest quality product for the lowest possible cost. It applies real-time statistical process control (SPC) to detect unexpected process changes. Once detected, WinSPC executes your predefined appropriate actions to help your production staff prevent scrap and rework. It documents everything in an audit trail, generates live remote dashboards to share your status, and produces any required customer and compliance reports you visually define.

similar_products.short_desc: The AFFORDABLE SOLUTION for small to mid-size MANUFACTURING companies. Best value. full featured, QMS Software. Windows 10 (not web).
similar_products.features: The AFFORDABLE SOLUTION for small to mid-size companies. Designed specifically for MANUFACTURING companies, Quality Collaboration By Design (QCBD) is an integrated Quality Management Software for managing all your quality data. QCBD dramatically reduces the cost of achieving and maintaining compliance to quality management standards such as ISO 9001, ISO 13485, AS9100, TS 16949 and SQF 2000 / ISO 22000.  Window-based application (client-server, not a web application)

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful document control software ideal for centralized control of ISO and related quality program files.
similar_products.features: Powerful document control software to manage quality program files including policies, procedures, SOPs, certifications, log files, change records, non-conformance reports, corrective actions, work instructions, and more. Document Locator is a Windows-integrated document control system ideal for ISO and other quality programs. You maintain control in a centralized system that includes version control, approvals, notifications, required reading, reporting, and API for integrations.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of MRP tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software manages material requirements for manufacturing processes. These applications are also known as Manufacturing Resources Planning (MRP II) systems. MRP software enables more efficient business process management for production planning and inventory control, ensuring that materials are readily available to meet production demands. MRP software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, Manufacturing Execution Systems and Production Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Product Lifecycle Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Product Lifecycle Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) software integrates each of the processes required to design, build, deploy and maintain products. Organizations use PLM applications to reduce the time and expenses associated with the development, manufacturing and repair or upgrade of their products. Product Lifecycle Management solutions aid in identifying and implementing cost-saving changes to the manufacturing processes, optimizing design engineering and centralizing supplier and part inventory data. Product Lifecycle Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, MRP software and Quality Management software.

_source.short_desc: Experts in Infor SyteLine/CloudSuite Industrial for 30+ years, LogicData assists manufacturers in achieving their operational success.
_source.long_desc: The ultimate in deep manufacturing functionality for the complex, mid-market manufacturer, Infor's CloudSuite Industrial (SyteLine) provides you with end-to-end functionality to manage all aspects of your enterprise.  This is a mixed mode manufacturing product that can simultaneously handle discrete, process, build to order, build to stock and project style manufacturing.  And with LogicDatas 30+ years of experience working exclusively with SyteLine, we will help ensure your success.
_source.target_audience: Metal/plastic fabricators, machinery/equipment, medical device, automotive, aerospace/defense, electronics, furniture,  windows/doors, food/beverage, paint/coatings, distributors. 2 tier ERP support.

related_products.short_desc: The leading accounting software for small businesses. Instant access to customer, vendor and employee information.
related_products.features: QuickBooks Enterprise (Save Up to 40%) is an end-to-end accounting software that can grow with your business. It provides all the tools your business needs, yet is easy to use. You can organize your books, manage inventory, track sales, and even run payroll, but at the fraction of the cost. With QuickBooks Enterprise, you save thousands of dollars a year vs. comparable solutions. Powerful and flexible, it also comes in editions designed to fit your specific needs. Take a free test drive today.

related_products.short_desc: Use monday.com Work OS to centralize and manage your enterprise resource planning, improve teamwork, and get more done - in one place.

Organize and manage budgets, resources, information, workflows, and more - all in one place.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite ERP lets you run your entire business on a single integrated cloud platform.

Run your entire business with a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, supply chain, and warehouse operations. Get real-time visibility into financial and operational performance across your organization, whether you have a single location or multiple subsidiaries.

related_products.short_desc: Fishbowl's ERP solution was built from the ground up to handle any size inventory with grace and efficiency.

Advanced work orders, material requirements planning (MRP), bills of materials and barcode scanning can be easily deployed on-premise or hosted in the cloud. related_products.short_desc: #1 free online ERP used by over 8 million businesses worldwide. Cloud, mobile and opens source editions available.

Don't worry, we also have on premise version of Bitrix24 with open source code access that you can install on your server as well.

Cin7 can be implemented in weeks not months because you do not need to rip and replace QuickBooks or Xero. It's a highly configurable inventory and order management solution with built-in EDI and integrations to all the popular eCommerce platforms, marketplaces, and 3PLs.

related_products.short_desc: An open-source suite of integrated apps to manage CRM, PoS, Website, eCommerce, Sales, Accounting, Warehouse, HR, Marketing, and more.

ALERE's manufacturing and inventory toolsets are second to none in the industry.

similar_products.short_desc: Kinetic is an end-to-end ERP solution for manufacturers that need real-time access to decision-making data anytime, anywhere.
similar_products.features: Kinetic is an end-to-end, cloud-based ERP solution developed to fit the specific needs of manufacturers in Aerospace/Defense, Automotive, Discrete, Electronics/High Tech, Fabricated Metals, Furniture/Fixtures, Industrial Machinery, Medical Device, Metal Service Centers and Rubber/Plastics industries. Equipped with advanced BI and analytic tools, Kinetic may improve operations, reduce costs, increase sales and margins, and improve customer service.

similar_products.short_desc: Modern inventory management and traceability ERP software with lot track/trace, costing, orders, POs, reports and integrations.
similar_products.features: Modern & easy to use inventory management and traceability ERP that enables your team to perform batch and lot track/trace, inventory control, formula/recipe management, unit and batch costing, customer orders & supplier purchasing, putting new  material into service, and moving your data between systems such as Quickbooks, Sage Intacct, Amazon Seller Central, Shopify and over 2,000 third-party platforms. B2B ordering portal. Runs on any internet-connected device - including tablets and phones.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-featured, customizable, cloud-based ERP built to handle your daily operations with integrations to Shopify, QBO and more.
similar_products.features: Paragon is a full-featured, cloud ERP that handles your daily operations from order and inventory management, to advanced supply chain, manufacturing and reporting. Connect your ecommerce and accounting operations with integrations to Shopify, QuickBooks Online and more. Paragon has all the features and functionality you expect from a custom solution for large and complex enterprises. ERP software designed for people, not users.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Performance Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Performance Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Performance Management software provides organizations with the data they need to make decisions that are in line with company strategy. Business Performance Management solutions link performance measurements (key performance indicators, or KPIs) with strategic planning goals. The forecasting ability of these applications helps organizations analyze their actions and take corrective measures to meet performance goals. Business Performance Management software is related to Budgeting software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Distribution software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Distribution tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Distribution software manages processes including inventory tracking and warehousing. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Distribution solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as channel monitoring features. Distribution software often provides integration for sales, purchase orders and pricing information, vendor and customer contact information along with accounting and business reporting tools. Distribution software is related to Logistics software, Shipping software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inventory Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inventory Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inventory Management software monitors inventory levels for optimal production and distribution of goods for wholesale or retail. These applications enable organizations to efficiently manage inventory as well as procurement and order fulfillment functions. Inventory Management solutions ensure accurate real-time inventory reporting and the ability to distribute this essential data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Inventory Management software is related to Inventory Control software and Supply Chain Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Logistics software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Logistics tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Logistics software automates warehousing, transportation management, shipping and other logistical functions, monitoring the flow of products from supplier to end user. These applications provide a wide variety of features including: inventory control, warehousing, purchasing and receiving, sales and shipping, barcode / RFID scanning and label printing. Logistics solutions typically offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting, and business reporting tools. Logistics software is related to Distribution software, RFID software, Shipping software, Trucking software and Warehouse Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of MRP tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Material Requirements Planning (MRP) software manages material requirements for manufacturing processes. These applications are also known as Manufacturing Resources Planning (MRP II) systems. MRP software enables more efficient business process management for production planning and inventory control, ensuring that materials are readily available to meet production demands. MRP software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software, Manufacturing Execution Systems and Production Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Supply Chain Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Supply Chain Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Supply Chain Management software automates the flow of processes from raw materials through to delivery of finished goods to the consumer. These applications allow for organization-wide order processing, transportation and warehouse management along with planning and forecasting tools. Supply Chain Management software provides for efficient operation through the distribution and synchronization of this key data across multiple locations and throughout an enterprise. Supply Chain Management software is related to Inventory Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Warehouse Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Warehouse Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Warehouse Management software enables the movement, tracking and storage of materials throughout the warehouse. These applications increase efficiency and reduce costs by allowing key data to be easily shared throughout an enterprise. Warehouse Management solutions typically provide inventory controls and tracking as well as procurement management and channel monitoring features. They also offer integration for vendor and customer management, accounting and business reporting tools. Warehouse Management software is related to Distribution software and Logistics software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.
